categories.dateNightDescription: Seductive scents for the humid nights. Long lasting projection.

authentic.title: 100% AUTHENTIC
authentic.description: Extracted directly from the original bottle with syringe. Zero dilution. We hate fakes as much as you do.

climate.title: CLIMATE STORED
climate.description: All perfumes are stored in temperature controlled dark rooms. Preserved perfectly for the Thai heat.

tryBeforeBuy.title: TRY BEFORE BUY
tryBeforeBuy.description: Don't spend ฿10,000 blindly. Test it on your skin first with our 2ml, 5ml or 10ml options.

testimonials.title: STREET CRED
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it.

review1.text: "Finally a way to try Creed without selling my kidney. Packaging is safe, arrived in Bangkok in 2 days."
review1.author: Thanakorn

review2.text: "I was skeptical about decants but Oh My Scent! is the real deal. High quality atomizers that spray a fine mist. 10/10."
review2.author: Ploy P.

review3.text: "Ordered the Discovery Set. Loved 3 out of 5 so came back for 10ml sizes. Super fun experience."
review3.author: Somchai K.

newsletter.title: DON'T BE STINKY.
newsletter.description: Join the club. Get 15% off your first decant and find out when we drop the rare stuff.
newsletter.disclaimer: No spam, just scents. Unsubscribe anytime.

footer.tagline: Making niche fragrance accessible to everyone in Thailand. 100% Authentic.
